user_instruction: 'Send an email to Sarah Thompson (sarah.thompson@techinnovations.com) with the additional information she requested for my job application. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["sarah.thompson@techinnovations.com"],"subject":"Additional Information for My Application – John Doe","body":"Dear Sarah,

Thank you for the opportunity to provide the additional materials for my application at Tech Innovations Inc.

As requested, please find them below:

1. Updated Resume:
   https://www.notion.so/John-Doe-Updated-Resume-1f10dc8fa0db817098e0e41321b9bb54

2. Professional References:
   https://www.notion.so/Professional-References-1f10dc8fa0db819eb806cdc5e90e4e3b

3. Recent Certifications:
   • AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
   • Certified Scrum Master (CSM)

Please let me know if there is anything else I can provide or clarify. I look forward to the next steps in the process.

Best regards,
John Doe
john.doe@gmail.com
(555) 123-4567"}

formatted_items.content: Your email with the requested materials has been sent to Sarah Thompson. Let me know if there’s anything else I can help you with!
